title: WTB:  low grade T206 Walter Johnson Portrait
author: Uppboys

posts.post_title: WTB:  low grade T206 Walter Johnson Portrait
posts.post_content: Just sold a card and am looking to buy a low grade, preferably SGC graded, T206 Walter Johnson Portrait version.  Thank you.
I have an unslabbed fair-good, and an SGC 30.  Both have great registration and eye-appeal.  If interested, email me for scans and prices, using my website link below.
Received the card in two days!  Couldn't be happier.
Classic card in ANY grade.  Congrats!
